description: Thiruwam Cooray Muhandiramge Nihal and Another Vs. Badureliya Arachchige Palitha Ariyarne and Another before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J.
parties: Thiruwam Cooray Muhandiramge Nihal and Another Vs. Badureliya Arachchige Palitha Ariyarne and Another
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J.
keywords: Can an objection be taken by the Respondent to an application made to Court by the competent authority under section 5 of the State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 of 1979 (as amended) that the Respondent is not the competent authority within the meaning of the Act.
legistation: Articles 138 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 1979 (as amended)-Sections 3, 4, 5(1), 6, 7, 8, 9(1) and 9(2) and 10.
